            NAME             NAMESPACE          BROKER                 DESCRIPTION         
---------------------------+-----------+-----------------------+---------------------------
  user-provided-service                  ups-broker              A user provided service   
  another-provided-service               ups-broker              Another provided service  
  user-provided-service      default     namespaced-ups-broker   A user provided service   
  another-provided-service   default     namespaced-ups-broker   Another provided service
